contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox settlement <!-- See Template:Infobox settlement for additional fields and descriptions --> | name = Yayladere | image_skyline = Yayladere.JPG | image_caption = Yayladere town | image_shield = | pushpin_map = Turkey | latd = 39 |latm = 13 |lats = 28 |latNS = N | longd = 40 |longm = 04 |longs = 21 |longEW = E | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_format = dms | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = [[Turkey]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of Turkey|Province]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Bingöl Province|Bingöl]] | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | leader_party = unabhängig | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Zeynel Ergin | leader_title1 = [[Kaymakam]] | leader_name1 = Adem Ergül | area_footnotes = {{Turkey district areas|SOURCE}} | area_blank1_title = District | area_blank1_km2 = {{Turkey district areas|Bingöl|Yayladere}} | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = {{Turkey district populations|SOURCE|Bingöl}} | population_urban = {{Turkey district populations|Bingöl|Yayladere|şehir}} | population_as_of = {{Turkey district populations|YEAR}} | population_blank1_title = District | population_blank1 = {{Turkey district populations|Bingöl|Yayladere|toplam}} | population_density_blank1_km2 = auto | postal_code_type = Post code | postal_code = 12500 | website = {{URL| www.yayladere.bel.tr | www.yayladere.bel.tr }} }} '''Yayladere''' is a town and district of [[Bingöl Province]] in the [[Eastern Anatolia Region, Turkey|Eastern Anatolia]] region of [[Turkey]]. The mayor is Zeynel Ergin ([[Independent (politician)|Independent]]). The district has twenty-six villages and eighty hamlets. There are 2,000 people living in the district as per 2007 estimates. It is known for its [[Turkish cuisine|lamb dishes]]. ==References== {{reflist}} {{Districts of Turkey|provname=Bingöl}} [[Category:Populated places in Bingöl Province]] [[Category:Districts of Bingöl Province]] {{EAnatolia-geo-stub}}
